item.title: 最新消息：调查人员说，他们已经找到了一名 11 岁德克萨斯州女孩的尸体。
item.description:
BREAKING: Investigators said that they have found the body of an 11-year-old Texas girl who went missing last week when she missed her bus to school.

abcnews.go.com/US/missing-11…

item.title: 最新消息：调查人员说，他们已经找到了一名 11 岁德克萨斯州女孩的尸体。
item.description: BREAKING: Investigators said that they have found the body of an 11-year-old Texas girl who went missing last week when she missed her bus to school. trib.al/30ofHKG

item.title: 在法官下令前总统特朗普为其民事欺诈案支付 3.54 亿美元的四天后，纽约州总检察长莱蒂娅-詹姆斯（Letitia James）告诉 ABC 新闻，如果前总统无法找到现金来支付罚款，她准备没收他的资产。
item.description:
Four days after a judge ordered former Pres. Trump to pay $354 million in his civil fraud case, NY AG Letitia James told ABC News that she is prepared to seize the former president's assets if he is unable to find the cash to cover the fine.

abcnews.go.com/US/letitia-ja…

item.title: 西弗吉尼亚州立法机构正在审议一项法案，该法案将取消对图书管理员在图书中包含所谓 "淫秽 "内容方面的保护。
item.description: The West Virginia legislature is considering a bill that would remove protections for librarians concerning books that include alleged "obscene" material. trib.al/gWys9fv

item.title: 美国官员说，美国外交官正准备向联合国安理会提交一份决议，呼吁在加沙实行临时停火，以换取释放飞地内的所有人质，并提出其他几项要求。
item.description: American diplomats are preparing to present a resolution to the U.N. Security Council calling for a temporary cease-fire in Gaza in exchange for the release of all hostages held inside the enclave and making several other demands, U.S. officials said. trib.al/Yw7nOQL

item.title: 在全国各地的手术室里，越来越多的糖尿病患者因 2 型糖尿病并发症而接受截肢手术。
item.description: In operating rooms across the country, more and more diabetics are receiving amputations due to complications from type-2 diabetes. trib.al/lHqaObZ

item.title: 据弗吉尼亚理工大学称，该校一名 20 岁的学生几天前失踪。
item.description: A 20-year-old Virginia Tech student has been reported missing after he vanished days ago, according to the university. trib.al/jFhgPhH

item.title: YouTube 视频博客作者鲁比-弗兰科（Ruby Franke）于 12 月在犹他州承认了四项虐待儿童的罪名，并被连续判处一至十五年的监禁。
item.description: YouTube vlogger Ruby Franke has been sentenced to four consecutive sentences of one to 15 years in prison after pleading guilty to four counts of child abuse in Utah in December. abcnews.visitlink.me/Id90ST

item.title: 据警方称，涉嫌本月早些时候在 SoHo 一家酒店内殴打并勒死一名皇后区妇女的男子已在亚利桑那州被捕，他在那里被控犯有两起刺伤案。
item.description: The man suspected in the beating and strangulation death of a Queens woman inside a SoHo hotel earlier this month is under arrest in Arizona, where he is charged in two stabbings, according to police. trib.al/0Ec9kAD

item.title: Connexions Classroom 创始人、Ruby Franke 的前商业伙伴 Jodi Hildebrandt 在承认四项虐待儿童罪后，被连续判处四次一至十五年的监禁。
item.description: Connexions Classroom founder and Ruby Franke's former business partner Jodi Hildebrandt has been sentenced to four consecutive terms of one to 15 years after pleading guilty to four counts of child abuse. trib.al/Ym8fVO6

item.title: 最新消息：检察官宣布，两名成年人因涉嫌参与上周在酋长队超级碗游行中发生的大规模枪击案而受到指控。
item.description: BREAKING: Two adults have been charged in connection with the mass shooting at the Chiefs' Super Bowl parade last week, prosecutors announced. trib.al/MFkbQ5X

item.title: 最新消息：检察官宣布，两名成年人因涉嫌参与上周在酋长队超级碗游行中发生的大规模枪击案而受到指控。
item.description: BREAKING: Two adults have been charged in connection with the mass shooting at the Chiefs' Super Bowl parade last week, prosecutors announced. trib.al/YZuXahs

item.title: 据法庭文件显示，涉嫌枪杀两名明尼苏达州警察和一名医护人员的枪手在这起致命枪杀案中被终身禁止持有枪支。
item.description: The gunman suspected in the fatal shootings of two Minnesota police officers and a paramedic was serving a lifetime ban from possessing firearms at the time of the deadly encounter, according to court documents. trib.al/0PeLPaR

item.title: 奥斯卡获奖导演萨姆-门德斯（Sam Mendes）将执导四部关于甲壳虫乐队的电影，每部电影都将从不同乐队成员的视角出发。
item.description: Oscar-winning director Sam Mendes is on board to direct not one, but four movies about the Beatles, each one told from the point of view of a different band member. trib.al/edWS1VP

item.title:
据弗吉尼亚理工大学称，该校一名学生几天前失踪。
校方称，约翰尼-罗普（Johnny Roop）当时正准备开车去父母家参加在线考试，但他一直没有到达。
item.description:
A Virginia Tech student has been reported missing after he vanished days ago, according to the university.

Johnny Roop was traveling to drive to his parent's house to take an online exam, but he never arrived, the university said. trib.al/WFS2X3w

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院周五裁定，根据该州法律，冷冻胚胎具有作为人的资格--批评人士称，这一裁定可能会威胁到后罗伊时代家庭获得生育治疗的机会，专家们对此发表了看法。
item.description: Experts are speaking out after the Alabama Supreme Court ruled Friday that frozen embryos qualify as people under state law — a decision that critics say could threaten families' access to fertility treatments in the post-Roe era. trib.al/N1qY43d

item.title: 印第安纳波利斯当局公布了一名 35 岁女性的姓名，她是在华夫饼屋餐厅发生的一起枪击案中遇害的。
item.description: Authorities in Indianapolis have released the name of a 35-year-old woman who was slain during a shooting that apparently started with an argument between two groups of people at a Waffle House restaurant. trib.al/FAi5rjt

item.title: 稍安勿躁费城清晨的交通有些不寻常，一匹马被发现在 I-95 州际公路上午的车流中疾驰。
item.description: HOLD YOUR HORSES: Early morning commuters in Philadelphia had some unusual traffic when a horse was spotted galloping alongside AM traffic on I-95. abcnews.visitlink.me/jwARhd

item.title: 最新消息：一名美国官员向ABC新闻证实，一架在也门附近飞行的美军MQ-9 "死神 "战斗机被胡塞武装分子击落。胡塞武装称，他们的目标是 "死神 "以及亚丁湾的两艘美国船只。
item.description:
JUST IN: An American MQ-9 Reaper flying near Yemen has been shot down by Houthi militants, a U.S. official confirmed to ABC News. The Houthis said they had targeted the Reaper as well as two American ships in the Gulf of Aden.

abcnews.go.com/Politics/hout…

item.title: 根据美国商业赌场协会周二公布的数据，2023 年美国商业赌场将从赌客手中赢取 665 亿美元，这将是该行业有史以来最好的一年。
item.description: America's commercial casinos won $66.5 billion from gamblers in 2023 — the industry's best year ever — according to figures released by its national trade association Tuesday. trib.al/PErxfi7

item.title: 一项新的研究发现，女性比男性更容易从运动中获益。
item.description: A new study has found that women experience greater benefits from exercise than men do — with less effort. trib.al/obmrC9g

item.title: 最高法院周二驳回了三位美国众议院共和党议员的上诉，他们对 2021 年在众议院未戴面罩被罚款提出了质疑。
item.description: The Supreme Court on Tuesday rejected appeals from three Republican U.S. House members who challenged fines for not wearing face coverings on the House floor in 2021. trib.al/OBEKLEA

item.title: 最新消息：一名美国官员向 @ABC 新闻证实，一架在也门附近飞行的美国 MQ-9 死神被胡塞武装分子击落。
item.description: JUST IN: An American MQ-9 Reaper flying near Yemen has been shot down by Houthi militants, a U.S. official confirmed to @ABC News. trib.al/ZkE0fpW

item.title: 与佛罗里达州南部一所小学疫情有关的麻疹病例已增至五例。
item.description: The number of measles cases linked to an elementary school outbreak in southern Florida has risen to five. trib.al/zO96yXi

item.title: 最新消息：YouTube 视频博客作者鲁比-弗兰科（Ruby Franke）承认犯有严重虐待两个孩子的罪行，周二被判处 1 至 15 年监禁的四次连续刑期。
item.description: BREAKING: YouTube vlogger Ruby Franke, who pleaded guilty to aggravated child abuse of two of her children, was sentenced Tuesday to four consecutive sentences of one to 15 years in prison. trib.al/SkyKnM9

item.title:
俄罗斯当局尚未将俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗体交给其家人。
更多信息
item.description:
Russian authorities have yet to turn over the remains of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny to his family.

Read more: abcnews.go.com/International…

item.title: 最新消息：YouTube 视频博客作者鲁比-弗兰科（Ruby Franke）承认犯有严重虐待两个孩子的罪行，周二被判处 1 至 15 年监禁的四次连续刑期。
item.description: BREAKING: YouTube vlogger Ruby Franke, who pleaded guilty to aggravated child abuse of two of her children, was sentenced Tuesday to four consecutive sentences of one to 15 years in prison. trib.al/mUD4G5R

item.title:
最新消息：前联合国大使妮基-黑莉（Nikki Haley）誓言将继续参加2024年共和党初选，尽管她在一些早期州遭到选民的反对，并在众多民调中继续落后于竞争对手唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）。
阅读更多
item.description:
JUST IN: Former U.N. Ambassador Nikki Haley is vowing to stay in the 2024 Republican primary race despite being rejected by voters in some early states and continuing to trail rival Donald Trump in numerous polls.

Read more: abcnews.go.com/Politics/hale…

item.title: 尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）发誓要留在2024年的共和党初选中，尽管她在一些早期的州中遭到了选民的反对--而且在众多民意调查中继续落后于竞争对手唐纳德-特朗普。
item.description: Nikki Haley is vowing to stay in the 2024 Republican primary race despite being rejected by voters in some early states — and continuing to trail rival Donald Trump in numerous polls. trib.al/Q4m6f7E

item.title: 最新消息：白宫官员称，白宫将于周五宣布新的 "重大 "制裁方案，"追究俄罗斯的责任"，以回应阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼之死。
item.description: BREAKING: The White House will announce a new "major" sanctions package on Friday "to hold Russia accountable" in response to Alexei Navalny's death, officials said. trib.al/Sbpl84C
